txt.en: 'We will put these materials to good use. The gate will hold against the enemy and we shall redouble efforts to strengthen it further.\n\n'Thank you for your assistance.'
Collect materials to build a gate to seal off the entrance of Tiríth Rhaw. All the materials needed can be found in the wilds of the Ettenmoors.
Return to Haliggyr at Tiríth Rhaw
Now that you have control of the tower of Tiríth Rhaw, you must build a door to defend the exterior of the tower.
'Quickly, gather the materials. The longer we are without defence, the more risk that we lose the tower.'

'We have captured Tiríth Rhaw and now must see to its defence. If you provide the materials, we can build the front gate quickly and deter the enemy from advancing within the tower. Make haste [placeholder], lest the enemy return and drive us out too quickly.'
